The center is the ultimate one-stop shop where you can get a full range of diagnostic services to investigate a wide range of illnesses and conditions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Officer - Healthcare Sector

	Conduct proofreading and editing of all documents to ensure clarity and grammar accuracy and correctness together with the Quality Departmental team leads.

  "description": "Nina Jojer Limited is a Pan-African consulting firm committed to empowering transformation in Africa by providing innovative solutions to businesses, governments, and organizations. Our core services include provision of HR solutions, Policy Development, Strategic Advisory, Stakeholder Management and Advocacy, Digital Transformation, and Data-Driven Insights. We are dedicated to driving impact and fostering long-term growth for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Consultant Engineer

Job Locations:&nbsp;Bauchi, Borno and Sokoto
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	To support on-site inspection and evaluation of installation, commissioning, and testing of Photovoltaic solar systems at 371 health facilities across Nigeria to ensure that solarisation work performed by service providers meets UNICEF standards and requirements for quality.


Main Responsibilities and Tasks
Perform on-site inspections related to:


	Commissioning and operational test of installed solar modules.
	Compliance with design, standards, environmental permits, etc.
	Compliance with specifications of solar panels, inverters, batteries, structures, and cabinets as per the brochures provided by the service providers.
	Quality check of solar modules after installation.
	Independent review in case of claims and non-compliance disputes (analysis of deviations).
	Compliance with Terms of Reference (ToR) and Technical Proposals submitted by the service providers.
	Verification of milestone completion.
	Verification of accuracy in reports/deliverables submitted by the service providers.


Deliverables:


	Site Inspection Report, compiling the results of onsite inspection using the inspection template provided by UNICEF for each of the solarised health facilities that the consultant engineers will be assigned for inspection.


Requirements
Education Background:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Electrical or Renewable Energy Engineering.
	COREN certification or other internationally recognised certification for a solar installer/engineer is strongly preferred.
	Expertise with photovoltaic (PV) technology, solar radiation, energy storage and grid integration is a strong advantage.


Language:


	Fluency in English


Work Experience:


	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in the solar energy field, particularly on energy assessment, evaluation, site inspection, failure analysis and post installation, commissioning and testing assessment.
	Proven ability to inspect and evaluate the solar module installation and commissioning in resource-limited settings.
	Ability to collect and analyse data, effect corrections, and prepare technical reports.
	Ability to work in an international or multicultural environment. Prior experiences within the UN system are a strong asset.
	Proficiency in computer applications, including Excel and PowerPoint.
	Good analytical, technical report-writing, and communication skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;careers.ninajojer@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.",

Consultant Engineer Job at Nina Jojer Limited




        
    

        
        Nina Jojer Limited is a Pan-African consulting firm committed to empowering transformation in Africa by providing innovative solutions to businesses, governments, and organizations. Our core services include provision of HR solutions, Policy Development, Strategic Advisory, Stakeholder Management and Advocacy, Digital Transformation, and Data-Driven Insights. We are dedicated to driving impact and fostering long-term growth for our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Consultant Engineer

Job Locations: Bauchi, Borno and Sokoto
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	To support on-site inspection and evaluation of installation, commissioning, and testing of Photovoltaic solar systems at 371 health facilities across Nigeria to ensure that solarisation work performed by service providers meets UNICEF standards and requirements for quality.


Main Responsibilities and Tasks
Perform on-site inspections related to:


	Commissioning and operational test of installed solar modules.
	Compliance with design, standards, environmental permits, etc.
	Compliance with specifications of solar panels, inverters, batteries, structures, and cabinets as per the brochures provided by the service providers.
	Quality check of solar modules after installation.
	Independent review in case of claims and non-compliance disputes (analysis of deviations).
	Compliance with Terms of Reference (ToR) and Technical Proposals submitted by the service providers.
	Verification of milestone completion.
	Verification of accuracy in reports/deliverables submitted by the service providers.


Deliverables:


	Site Inspection Report, compiling the results of onsite inspection using the inspection template provided by UNICEF for each of the solarised health facilities that the consultant engineers will be assigned for inspection.


Requirements
Education Background:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical or Renewable Energy Engineering.
	COREN certification or other internationally recognised certification for a solar installer/engineer is strongly preferred.
	Expertise with photovoltaic (PV) technology, solar radiation, energy storage and grid integration is a strong advantage.


Language:


	Fluency in English


Work Experience:


	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in the solar energy field, particularly on energy assessment, evaluation, site inspection, failure analysis and post installation, commissioning and testing assessment.
	Proven ability to inspect and evaluate the solar module installation and commissioning in resource-limited settings.
	Ability to collect and analyse data, effect corrections, and prepare technical reports.
	Ability to work in an international or multicultural environment. Prior experiences within the UN system are a strong asset.
	Proficiency in computer applications, including Excel and PowerPoint.
	Good analytical, technical report-writing, and communication skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: careers.ninajojer@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

Relationship Manager Job at AXA Mansard Insurance Plc




        
    

        
        AXA Mansard Insurance plc was incorporated in 1989 as a private limited liability company and is registered as a composite company with the National Insurance Commission of Nigeria (NAICOM). Our products range from Life to Property and Casualty for individuals, commercial solutions for SMEs and corporate organisations.

AXA Mansard Insurance plc is rated B+ by A.M. Best (2016) for Financial Strength. The Company is also certified ISO 9001:2008 compliant by the Standard Organisation of Nigeria (SON) for quality management systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Relationship Manager

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers 
Job type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



About the job


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for gaining a deep understanding of the clients' business objectives and challenges and creating strategic recommendations based off of this understanding.
	You will do so by building a strong relationship with our clients and analyzing our clients' data.
	Essentially, you will act as the main point of contact for our clients.


Responsibilities


	Dialogue with our clients to understand their business objectives and challenges
	Analyze clients' data and provide strategic recommendations to clients
	Present value-proposition to sales leads and current customers
	Prospect for new sales leads and close sales


Qualifications


	4 - 6 years of client relationship experience
	Ability to manage multiple projects and clients
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
